mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIFA ( id, pw, name, role ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{role} )
INSERT INTO Club ( name, emblem, anchorage, stadium ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{emblem}, #{anchorage}, #{stadium} )
INSERT INTO Manager ( name, profile, country, birth, height, weight, ovr, tactic ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{profile}, #{country}, #{birth}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{ovr}, #{tactic} )

INSERT INTO Player ( name, profile, country, birth, height, weight, fovr, movr, dovr, govr ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{profile}, #{country}, #{birth}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{fovr}, #{movr}, #{dovr}, #{govr} )
mapper.select: SELECT name, stadium, anchorage, regdate FROM Club ORDER BY regdate ASC
SELECT name, ovr, tactic FROM Manager ORDER BY ovr DESC
SELECT name, fovr, movr, dovr, govr FROM Player ORDER BY fovr DESC
SELECT name, anchorage, stadium, regdate FROM Club WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT name, country, birth, height, weight, ovr, tactic FROM Manager WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT name, country, birth, height, weight, fovr, movr, dovr, govr, history, club FROM Player WHERE name = #{name}
